data.headline: Experienced Product Manager | Enterprise Architecture Specialist
data.summary: Seasoned product manager with a strong background in enterprise architecture. Adept at bridging the gap between business and technology, delivering innovative solutions that drive organizational success.

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
bullets: Drove the development and launch of a cloud-based enterprise software platform, resulting in a 25% increase in customer adoption.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define product roadmaps and prioritize features based on user needs and business objectives.
Implemented agile practices to streamline the product development lifecycle, improving time-to-market by 20%.
Conducted market research and competitive analysis to identify new opportunities and enhance the product portfolio.

experience.title: Product Manager
bullets: Served as a liaison between business stakeholders and the technical team, ensuring alignment on product requirements and delivery.
Spearheaded the redesign of the company's flagship enterprise application, resulting in a 15% increase in user satisfaction.
Analyzed customer feedback and market trends to identify opportunities for product enhancements and new feature development.

projects.name: Enterprise Cloud Platform
projects.description: Designed and managed the development of a scalable cloud-based platform to streamline enterprise-wide operations.

projects.name: Mobile App Modernization
projects.description: Led the redesign and migration of a legacy mobile application to a modern, responsive platform.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Émilie Lefebvre, a mid-career product manager with experience in enterprise architecture, looking confident and approachable.
